name: Ghost Suburb II: From Beyond Sleep Into The Eyes of Madness
name_original: Ghost Suburb II: From Beyond Sleep Into The Eyes of Madness
description:
Ghost Suburb II: From Beyond Sleep Into The Eyes of Madness

I think I missed a game, but that's fine. Ghost Suburb I is really special.

"Overview of Damages:
Several weeks of insomnia, coalescing into blood filled afternoons where a single friend resides inside that which I doubt is truly there."

A game about a nurse in Midland Research Hospital Center, in the middle of a Hospital Zone- her name is Okay. She is a insomniac. There is a friend named Gertrud, who pesters her and is a giant floating sphere of darkness with a eye on it.
It is highly debatable whether she is in fact a real thing.
There is also a variety of activities which involve story based game play, and exploration. That is nice.
There is a lot of electronic music as well. I guess that is alright too.
I probably should battle test it more before bringing this out-
but like most things I make I will fix what I miss later at some later date,
fate can't stop you. But at least when it tries you can curb stomp it.
